assertionResults.fullName: PermissionGuard - Basic Permission Checks should render children when user has the required permission
assertionResults.title: should render children when user has the required permission

assertionResults.fullName: PermissionGuard - Basic Permission Checks should not render children when user lacks permission
assertionResults.title: should not render children when user lacks permission

assertionResults.title: should default to "read" permission if none specified

assertionResults.fullName: PermissionGuard - Multiple Permissions should check for any of multiple permissions when requireAll is false
assertionResults.title: should check for any of multiple permissions when requireAll is false

assertionResults.fullName: PermissionGuard - Multiple Permissions should check for all permissions when requireAll is true
assertionResults.title: should check for all permissions when requireAll is true

assertionResults.fullName: PermissionGuard - Multiple Permissions should not render children when any permission check fails with requireAll=true
assertionResults.title: should not render children when any permission check fails with requireAll=true

assertionResults.fullName: PermissionGuard - Multiple Permissions should not render children when all permission checks fail with requireAll=false
assertionResults.title: should not render children when all permission checks fail with requireAll=false

assertionResults.fullName: PermissionGuard - UI Behavior should render fallback content when user lacks permission
assertionResults.title: should render fallback content when user lacks permission

assertionResults.title: should show loading indicator when loading and showLoading is true

assertionResults.title: should render nothing when silent is true and permission is denied

assertionResults.fullName: PermissionGuard - UI Behavior should not show loading indicator when showLoading is false
assertionResults.title: should not show loading indicator when showLoading is false
